Guardian:Gem_Cyan.NAME: Aquamarine
Guardian:Gem_Cyan.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Gem. NL Add a *Crystal *Ward to your hand.

Guardian:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Guardian:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL guardianmod:Volatile.

Guardian:DonusPower.NAME: Ancient Attack
Guardian:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DecasProtection.NAME: Ancient Power
Guardian:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:FierceBash.NAME: Fierce Bash
Guardian:FierceBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place this into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - Increase this card's damage by !M!.

Guardian:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Guardian:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Guardian:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
Guardian:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Must be in *Defensive *Mode. NL Exit *Defensive *Mode. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies.

Guardian:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
Guardian:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block if in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode. NL Otherwise, guardianmod:Brace !M!.

Guardian:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
Guardian:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL When this card would leave guardianmod:Stasis, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL guardianmod:Volatile.

Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.NAME: Hyper Beam
Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Strength affects this card !M! times. NL Skip your next turn.

Guardian:BronzeArmor.NAME: Bronze Armor
Guardian:BronzeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL guardianmod:Brace 10. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:FloatingOrbs.NAME: Floating Orbs
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Orb *Slam to your hand.
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an *Orb *Slam to your hand.

Guardian:Orbwalk.NAME: Orbwalk
Guardian:Orbwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL guardianmod:Tick - Gain 1 Strength. NL guardianmod:Volatile.
Guardian:Orbwalk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL guardianmod:Tick - Gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:WalkerClaw.NAME: Walker Claw
Guardian:WalkerClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

Guardian:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Guardian:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL guardianmod:Brace !M!. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Harden.NAME: Harden
Guardian:Harden.DESCRIPTION: Must be in *Defensive *Mode. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns.

Guardian:SentryBeam.NAME: Sentry Blast
Guardian:SentryBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a *Sentry *Wave into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a *Sentry *Wave+ into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:SentryWave.NAME: Sentry Wave
Guardian:SentryWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Place a *Sentry *Blast into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL guardianmod:Brace 2. NL Place a *Sentry *Blast+ into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:CompilePackage.NAME: Compile Package
Guardian:CompilePackage.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three guardianmod:Packages to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:CompilePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three guardianmod:Packages to add to your hand. The cards the guardianmod:Package adds will all be Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageShapes.NAME: Package: Shapes
Guardian:PackageShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Time *Bomb, *Spiker *Protocol, and *Repulsor to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Time *Bomb, *Spiker *Protocol, and *Repulsor to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.NAME: Package: Ancients
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.DESCRIPTION: Add an *Ancient *Attack, *Ancient *Power, and *Ancient *Construct to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an *Ancient *Attack, *Ancient *Power, and *Ancient *Construct to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSphere.NAME: Package: Spheric
Guardian:PackageSphere.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Spheric *Shield, *Harden, and *Floating *Orbs to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSphere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Spheric *Shield, *Harden, and *Floating *Orbs to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSentry.NAME: Package: Sentry
Guardian:PackageSentry.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Sentry *Blast and two *Sentry *Waves to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSentry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Sentry *Blast+ and two *Sentry *Waves+ to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageWalker.NAME: Package: Orbwalker
Guardian:PackageWalker.DESCRIPTION: Add an *Orbwalk, *Walker *Claw, and *Incinerate to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageWalker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an *Orbwalk, *Walker *Claw, and *Incinerate to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageAutomaton.NAME: Package: Bronze
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Hyper *Beam, *Orb *Beam, and *Bronze *Armor to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Hyper *Beam, *Orb *Beam, and *Bronze *Armor to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDefect.NAME: Package: Defect
Guardian:PackageDefect.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Reroute, *Preprogram, and *Time *Capacitor to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDefect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Reroute, *Preprogram, and *Time *Capacitor to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Planning.NAME: Planning
Guardian:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Place the top !M! cards of your draw pile into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:Recover.NAME: Recover
Guardian:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL guardianmod:Brace !M!. NL Place a card from your discard pile into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
Guardian:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Accelerate until a card in guardianmod:Stasis returns to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:Emergency.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Accelerate until a card in guardianmod:Stasis returns to your hand.

Guardian:Clone.NAME: Clone
Guardian:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Place a copy of that card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:Clone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Place a copy of that card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Accelerate. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Preprogram.NAME: Preprogram
Guardian:Preprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may choose one to place into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:GemFinder.NAME: Gem Finder
Guardian:GemFinder.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, you may choose a Common guardianmod:Gem to add to your deck.

Guardian:StasisField.NAME: Stasis Field
Guardian:StasisField.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL When this leaves Stasis, increase its Block by !M! and set its cost back to 1.

Guardian:StasisStrike.NAME: Stasis Strike
Guardian:StasisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL When this leaves Stasis, increase its damage by !M! and set its cost back to 1.

Guardian:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Plans
Guardian:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in guardianmod:Stasis.
Guardian:FuturePlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:Suspension.NAME: Suspension
Guardian:Suspension.DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand into guardianmod:Stasis.
Guardian:Suspension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Place a card in your hand into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:ConstructionForm.NAME: Construction Form
Guardian:ConstructionForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! guardianmod:Buffer. NL At the start of each turn, if you have guardianmod:Buffer, gain 1 Strength.
Guardian:ConstructionForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! guardianmod:Buffer. NL At the start of each turn, if you have guardianmod:Buffer, gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:RollAttack.NAME: Roll Attack
Guardian:RollAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, affects ALL enemies. Otherwise, guardianmod:Brace 8.

Guardian:GemFire.NAME: Gem Cannon
Guardian:GemFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all guardianmod:Gems and all Socketed cards. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each guardianmod:Gem in those cards. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:GemFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all guardianmod:Gems and all Socketed cards. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each guardianmod:Gem in those cards. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:ChargeCore.NAME: Charge Core
Guardian:ChargeCore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - Draw a card. NL guardianmod:Volatile.

Guardian:Reroute.NAME: Reroute
Guardian:Reroute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next non-Exhausting Attack or Skill you play this turn into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:PiercingHide.NAME: Piercing Hide
Guardian:PiercingHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! temporary Thorns. NL guardianmod:Brace 3.

Guardian:ShieldSpikes.NAME: Shield Spikes
Guardian:ShieldSpikes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns if in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode. Otherwise, guardianmod:Brace 8.

Guardian:PrismaticBeam.NAME: Prismatic Spray
Guardian:PrismaticBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each guardianmod:Gem in this card.

Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.NAME: Prismatic Barrier
Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each guardianmod:Gem in this card.

Guardian:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
Guardian:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] if you have a card in guardianmod:Stasis.
Guardian:TemporalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] if you have a card in guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:TemporalShield.NAME: Temporal Shield
Guardian:TemporalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card if you have a card in guardianmod:Stasis.
Guardian:TemporalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards if you have a card in guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:RefractedBeam.NAME: Refracted Beam
Guardian:RefractedBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Decrease the number of times this card hits by 1 this combat. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Guardian:MultiBeam.NAME: Multi-Beam
Guardian:MultiBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL guardianmod:Tick - Increase this card's damage by !M!.

Guardian:BaubleBeam.NAME: Bauble Burst
Guardian:BaubleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL NL Perform !M! times:

Guardian:EvasiveProtocol.NAME: Evasive Protocol
Guardian:EvasiveProtocol.DESCRIPTION: While in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, raise your Dexterity by !M!. NL guardianmod:Brace 10.

Guardian:SpikerProtocol.NAME: Spiker Protocol
Guardian:SpikerProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns while in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode. NL guardianmod:Brace 10.

Guardian:ArmoredProtocol.NAME: Armored Protocol
Guardian:ArmoredProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn while in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode. NL guardianmod:Brace 10.

Guardian:TimeSifter.NAME: Time Sifter
Guardian:TimeSifter.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, guardianmod:Accelerate.
Guardian:TimeSifter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, guardianmod:Accelerate.

Guardian:AncientConstruct.NAME: Ancient Construct
Guardian:AncientConstruct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain !M! Artifact.
Guardian:AncientConstruct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Artifact. NL At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain !M! Artifact.

Guardian:CrystalBeam.NAME: Crystal Ray
Guardian:CrystalBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each guardianmod:Gem in ALL of your guardianmod:Socketed cards.

Guardian:Gem_Purple.NAME: Amethyst
Guardian:Gem_Purple.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Gem. NL ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.
Guardian:Gem_Purple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.

Guardian:Gem_Crimson.NAME: Garnet
Guardian:Gem_Crimson.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Gem. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.NAME: Fragmented Gem
Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Gem. NL Add a *Crystal *Shiv to your hand.

Guardian:Repulse.NAME: Repulsor
Guardian:Repulse.DESCRIPTION: When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.
Guardian:Repulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.

Guardian:BronzeOrb.NAME: Orb Support
Guardian:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Place a random card from your draw pile into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RevengeProtocol.NAME: Revenge Protocol
Guardian:RevengeProtocol.DESCRIPTION: While in guardianmod:Defensive_Mode, raise your Strength by !M!. NL guardianmod:Brace 10.

Guardian:GatlingBeam.NAME: Laser Turret
Guardian:GatlingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL guardianmod:Volatile.

Guardian:ShieldCharger.NAME: Shield Charger
Guardian:ShieldCharger.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - guardianmod:Brace 2, then Gain !B! Block and [E]. NL guardianmod:Volatile.

Guardian:StasisEngine.NAME: Stasis Engine
Guardian:StasisEngine.DESCRIPTION: When you play the 3rd 0-cost card in a single turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
Guardian:StasisEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play the 3rd 0-cost card in a single turn, gain [E] and draw a card.

Guardian:HammerDown.NAME: Hammer Down
Guardian:HammerDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double your Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:OmegaCannon.NAME: Omega Cannon
Guardian:OmegaCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each Strength you have.

Guardian:ModeShift.NAME: Mode Shift
Guardian:ModeShift.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Strength and Dexterity. NL Draw a card.
Guardian:ModeShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Swap your Strength and Dexterity. NL Draw a card.

Guardian:PackageConstruct.NAME: Package: Construct
Guardian:PackageConstruct.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hammer Down, Omega Cannon, and Mode Shift to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageConstruct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hammer Down, Omega Cannon, and Mode Shift to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageMass.NAME: Package: Mass
Guardian:PackageMass.DESCRIPTION: Add a Mass of Spikes, Mass of Bombs, and Group Slam to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageMass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Mass of Spikes, Mass of Bombs, and Group Slam to your hand and Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:MassOfThorns.NAME: Mass Of Spikes
Guardian:MassOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Thorns. NL Exhaust if you have Artifact.

Guardian:MassTimeBomb.NAME: Mass Of Bombs
Guardian:MassTimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: In each empty guardianmod:Stasis slot, place a Time Bomb there. NL Exhaust if this created 2 or more Time Bombs.
Guardian:MassTimeBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In each empty guardianmod:Stasis slot, place an Upgraded Time Bomb there. NL Exhaust if this created 2 or more Time Bombs.

Guardian:MassSlam.NAME: Group Slam
Guardian:MassSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust if you have 3 or more Strength.

Guardian:BodySlam.NAME: Body Slam
Guardian:BodySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Block.
